title: Order Fulfillment Detail
description: This correlates with the notion of a delivery package. Multiple order_line_items in the order with the same "fulfillment_detail_id" would be considered to be part of the same delivery package.

id.description: Should match with fulfillment_detail_id from order_line_item.

tracking_identifier.description: Required if status != processing or canceled. The tracking identifier for the fulfillment.

fulfillment_tracking_url.description: Required if status != processing or canceled. URL to send the user to to see the tracking.

expected_fulfillment_time.description: RFC 3339 format. Required if status != processing or canceled. More granular date provided from the carrier.
